,d.oss_file_path as head_img
FROM maoding_web_project_member a INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_user b on a.company_user_id = b.id INNER JOIN maoding_web_account c on a.account_id = c.id
LEFT JOIN (
) d on a.account_id = d.user_id and d.attach_type = '5'
LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_process_node e on e.id = a.target_id
a.deleted = 0
order by a.member_type,a.seq

SELECT a.member_type,a.company_user_id, b.user_name, b.email,c.cellphone, d.oss_file_path as head_img FROM maoding_web_project_member a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user b on a.company_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_account c on b.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN (
) d on c.id = d.user_id and d.attach_type = '5'
deleted = 0 and a.status=0
order by a.member_type,a.seq

SELECT a.id, a.member_type, a.target_id, a.company_user_id, a.account_id, b.user_name, b.email, c.complete_time FROM maoding_web_project_member a INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_user b ON a.company_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_process_node c ON c.id = a.target_id WHERE deleted = 0 AND node_id = #{nodeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (a.member_type = 4 OR a.member_type = 5 OR a.member_type = 6) ORDER BY a.member_type, a.seq

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(node, ': ', userName, " ") ORDER BY member_type) FROM (SELECT a.member_type, (CASE (member_type) WHEN 4 THEN '设计' WHEN 5 THEN '校对' WHEN 6 THEN '审核' ELSE '' END) AS node, GROUP_CONCAT(b.user_name ORDER BY a.seq) AS userName FROM maoding_web_project_member a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user b ON a.company_user_id = b.id AND a.deleted = 0 WHERE a.node_id = #{taskId} GROUP BY a.member_type) a

SELECT a.id, a.company_user_id, b.user_name FROM (SELECT if(b.id IS NULL, a.id, b.id) id, if(b.id IS NULL, a.company_user_id, b.company_user_id) company_user_id FROM maoding_web_project_member a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_member b ON a.project_id = b.project_id AND b.deleted = 0 AND b.member_type = 3 AND (b.target_id = #{taskId} OR b.node_id = #{taskId}) WHERE a.project_id = #{projectId} AND a.company_id = #{companyId} AND a.member_type = 2 LIMIT 1) a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user b ON a.company_user_id = b.id

SELECT b.user_name FROM (SELECT if(b.id IS NULL, a.id, b.id) id, if(b.id IS NULL, a.company_user_id, b.company_user_id) company_user_id FROM maoding_web_project_member a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_member b ON a.project_id = b.project_id AND b.deleted = 0 AND b.member_type = 3 AND (b.target_id = #{taskId} OR b.node_id = #{taskId}) WHERE a.project_id = #{projectId} AND a.company_id = #{companyId} AND a.member_type = 2 LIMIT 1) a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user b ON a.company_user_id = b.id

SELECT a.id,a.project_id, a.company_id,a.company_user_id,a.account_id, b.user_name, b.email, c.cellphone,c.user_name as account_name, d.oss_file_path as head_img, group_CONCAT( DISTINCT CASE ( member_type) WHEN 0 THEN '立项人' WHEN 1 THEN '经营负责人' WHEN 2 THEN '设计负责人' WHEN 3 THEN '任务负责人' WHEN 4 THEN '设计人' WHEN 5 THEN '校对人' WHEN 6 THEN '审核人' WHEN 7 THEN '经营助理' WHEN 8 THEN '设计助理' ELSE '' END order by member_type separator '、' ) AS node_name FROM maoding_web_project_member a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user b on a.company_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_account c on a.account_id = c.id LEFT JOIN (
) d on a.account_id = d.user_id and d.attach_type = '5' where deleted = 0 and a.project_id = #{projectId} group by a.company_user_id ORDER BY case when a.company_id = #{projectCompanyId} then 1 else 2 end asc

SELECT hour1.project_id, b.id AS company_user_id, b.user_id AS account_id, b.user_name, b.email, c.cellphone, c.user_name AS account_name, d.oss_file_path AS head_img, FORMAT(SUM(hour1.labor_hours),1) AS hours, a.node_name FROM maoding_web_labor_hour hour1 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user b ON hour1.company_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_account c ON b.user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT company_user_id, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT CASE (member_type) WHEN 0 THEN '立项人' WHEN 1 THEN '经营负责人' WHEN 2 THEN '设计负责人' WHEN 3 THEN '任务负责人' WHEN 4 THEN '设计人' WHEN 5 THEN '校对人' WHEN 6 THEN '审核人' WHEN 7 THEN '经营助理' WHEN 8 THEN '设计助理' ELSE '' END ORDER BY member_type SEPARATOR '、' ) AS node_name FROM maoding_web_project_member WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND company_id = #{currentCompanyId} GROUP BY company_user_id ) a ON a.company_user_id = b.id LEFT JOIN (
) d on b.user_id = d.user_id and d.attach_type = '5' WHERE 1 = 1 AND hour1.project_id = #{projectId} AND hour1.company_id = #{currentCompanyId} AND hour1.deleted = 0 GROUP BY hour1.company_user_id
order by hours ASC
order by hours DESC
ORDER BY case when b.company_id = #{currentCompanyId} then 1 else 2 end asc

SELECT FORMAT(sum(hour1.labor_hours),1) as sumHours FROM maoding_web_labor_hour hour1 LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user b on hour1.company_user_id = b.id WHERE hour1.`company_id` = #{currentCompanyId} AND hour1.`project_id` = #{projectId} AND hour1.deleted = 0
